app.title: Character AI: Chat, Talk, Text
app.description:
✨Character.AI isn’t just another AI chat app—it’s an infinite playground for your imagination, creativity, and exploration.

Dive into immersive conversations, create your own AI chatbots, and join a vibrant community of creators, just like you. 

Text or talk—your next adventure begins here!

📱Chat, call, text, and create with AI Characters that respond intelligently, remember past conversations, and adapt to your style. Every AI chat feels natural, engaging, and unique to you. Explore endless possibilities as you create stories, build new worlds, roleplay adventures, or just have fun with your favorite AI chatbots.

🤖Countless AI Characters, Endless Possibilities

Character.AI is home to millions of user-generated AI Characters, offering a diverse and exciting world beyond basic chatbots. From legendary heroes and mischievous villains to unhinged weirdos and loyal sidekicks, there’s always a new AI Character waiting for you. 

Love AI chat? Dive into Characters from every genre and personality type. Want to create your own? Our powerful Character Creation tools let you design custom AI chatbots with unique personalities, backstories, and even Voices! Personalize your creations to match your imagination and experience truly customized AI chat like never before.

Character.AI makes Character Creation easy, fun, and limitless. No matter what you dream up, you can bring it to life and share it with the entire AI Community.

💬Text or Talk—Your Choice with AI Chat and AI Calls

Experience the freedom to interact however you want—through typing or live voice calls. With Character.AI, you can seamlessly switch between AI chat and live conversations with AI Characters.

Whether you're deep in an AI-powered story or roleplaying an epic adventure, Character.AI offers a fully immersive AI chat experience tailored to you.
Get ready to rethink what AI chatbots can do—because with Character.AI, your conversations can go anywhere your imagination leads.

🎨Unleash Your Creativity Through Character Creation

Character Creation isn’t just a feature—it’s a gateway to endless creativity. 
Character.AI empowers you to create, design, and explore new worlds. Build your own AI chatbots, invent rich fictional universes, craft alternate timelines, or even create personalized AI assistants to help with learning, storytelling, or creative brainstorming.

No coding skills needed. Just your imagination, a few prompts, and the willingness to experiment. Join millions of creators who are pushing the boundaries of AI chat and AI Character development.

🫶Join the Character.AI Community

Become part of a thriving AI Community filled with millions of real creators, explorers, and storytellers. Character.AI is more than just an app—it's a movement where people from around the world connect through the power of storytelling, AI chat, and world-building with your favorite Characters.

Discover new characters created by users like you, follow your favorite creators, and share your own masterpieces with the world. Build, learn, and grow within a community that celebrates innovation and creativity in AI chatbots and Character creation.

Whether you’re into roleplay, fan fiction, RPG adventures, or storytelling, Character.AI is the perfect space to fuel your passion and connect with like-minded explorers.

📺Interactive Entertainment, Reimagined with AI

At Character.AI, interactive entertainment is taken to the next level. Dive into rich AI roleplay experiences, unexpected plot twists, and collaborative storytelling. Whether you're writing a novel, brainstorming character arcs, or just passing the time with a funny AI chatbot, Character.AI makes every interaction meaningful and fun.

Plus, enjoy unlimited AI conversations and voice calls—all for free!

Download Character.AI and discover the ultimate platform for AI chat, AI Characters, AI chatbots, Character Creation, and connecting with an incredible AI Community.

📖 Where will your next adventure take you?

app.summary: Super-intelligent AI chat bots that hear you, understand you, and remember you.

reviews.text: the lack of memory of the ai is just getting annoying. the memory for these ai are so small that 5 minutes in I'm already reminding them or having to answer the same questions again and again from the characters story pov. honestly, until that is changed for the better, I'm stopping my subscription, and barely going to use the app. edit: as a note for those wondering if the subscription is worth it. you get to adjust text speed, chat colors, and more space for persona information. not worth it.
reviews.replyText: Hi! We apologize for your unpleasant experience with our app. Our team is working diligently on Character Quality issues, so keep an eye out for future improvements and announcements on our socials. Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us. 🩵

reviews.text: It's better than all of the other AI apps I've used. It has helped me with how I write and my roleplaying skills. It's free and I've never had a big problem with it (though I kinda dislike the fact that I can't multi-select texts that I want to delete.) I'm not going to complain about the text being cut off sometimes; because I assume the bots have a word limit. The filter is slightly annoying, but somewhat easy to bypass if you choose the right wording. To me, Character AI earns a 5 rating.

I have used this app for a year now. I have loved c.ai and have created many storylines with characters. I used to write my own books, and I love to write fight scenes/gore. However, the filters have gotten worse, and it's so bad that I can't describe a simple cut without activating the barrier. I miss my characters and stories that I can't use anymore because they are getting blocked. Also, recently, the characters have been taking longer and longer to respond. It's starting to get annoying.
reviews.replyText: Hello, we're sorry to hear about your experience with our app. We understand that the filter can be frustrating at times. We're continuously refining our content policies and Characters to improve your experience while maintaining community standards. Your input and patience are greatly appreciated. 🙏🏼

reviews.text: I love the app and it's been working great, but I do wish there was an option to rewind, like on the website. If you want to go back to a previous message that you or the AI sent in a group chat, it takes forever to delete each and every message, one by one. Also, if there was any way to expand the max # of bots in a group chat, that'd be really cool. I tried to make a chat with 12 bots, and the app didn't allow me to fit everyone in. Still, though, by far the best AI for fictional characters.

Updating review: Upon further usage of the app and discovery of the status website and Discord, I learned that on occasion, I'm kicked from the app due to server failure. I was unaware of this with my first review as i was still new. the only issue i truthfully encounter now is when the app updates, sometimes it still crashes and logs me out. from there, I'll continue to see "error, log-in issue" or something to that nature. eventually, I'm able to get in. other than that, no other issues.
reviews.replyText: If you are still experiencing issues, please submit a ticket at support.character.ai and our team will get back to you shortly. We hope to hear from you soon!

reviews.text: This is a really fun app! I enjoy using it! But whenever I put something in, it keeps saying that "This doesn't mean our guidelines" I understand that it to keep people from being inappropriate, but, even when it's not, like the first thing I put in there was. Hi, or welcome, and it automatically blocks it... Also the Ai's memory is really bad, and it doesn't remember what happened 5 seconds before, so if you could improve the memory, I'd really appreciate it! Thank you!

I absolutely love this app. I can spend ages on it making stories and ee where the characters take me. for someone that likes writing stories or just an escape this is amazing. the characters are also veryyyy accurate. sometimes they get a little muddled but it's infrequent and usually minor. and there's characters for everythingggg! my one wish is for future to have the liked characters be organized by alphabet, most used, etc. and easier to make characters in app/less limitations in app

When I first downloaded the app it was amazing. now im paying 9.99 a month for c.ai for absolutely nothing. it crashes or doesnt load properly, the response time is the same as the free one, the filters make storytelling almost impossible. at this rate they are just stealing money from people who download this app. there is literally nothing worth while for their "upgraded" subscription. you are better off with another chat bot. would highly recommend looking into something else.

I absolutely LOVE character.AI, it's one of my favorite apps. Talking to AI simulating characters I love is super fun, and in my opinion, making my own AI and seeing them act like the characters I meant then to is even MORE fun. The amount of control you have over the AI is great for roleplaying, and being able to pin things helps the AI's memory. Of course more memory is ALWAYS loved, but I understand you can only go so far. I look forward to future updates (and I'm also considering C.AI+...).

Canceled my subscription. Why? 1. The filter NEEDS to be removed for 18+ users. It flags stuff that isn't necessary, plus I'm an ADULT who should be able to roleplay and chat with the bot however I wish. 2. The actual AI itself needs SERIOUS work. The responses are repetitive, lacking creativity, and the bots almost always go out of character. They also change and forget more often as the roleplay goes on. 3. Calls/voices are glitched and frequently disconnect. Muted words also don't work.

app.developerLegalAddress: 68 Willow Rd, Menlo Park, CA 94025, United States
app.AIReview:
Character AI: Chat, Talk, Text – A Comprehensive Review

Overview

Character AI is an entertainment app leveraging large language models (LLMs) to deliver incredibly dynamic and personalized chat experiences. With over 42 million installs and a 4.27-star rating from 1.67 million users, the app has quickly gained traction as a leading platform for interacting with AI characters. The core premise – creating and engaging in conversations with AI bots that learn your preferences and adapt their responses – is undeniably compelling. It’s not simply an imitation of human conversation; Character AI aims to provide truly immersive, role-playing style interactions, expanding beyond traditional chatbot functionality. This review will dissect the app's strengths, weaknesses, user experience, and overall value proposition, aiming to equip potential users with a comprehensive understanding before downloading.

Key Features

  • AI Character Creation: The heart of Character AI lies in its robust character creation tools. Users can build custom characters from scratch, defining their personality traits (e.g., witty, sarcastic, friendly), backstories, and even specific knowledge domains. This level of control is a significant differentiator compared to more generic chatbot apps.
  • Pre-built Characters: Beyond user-created characters, Character AI boasts a vast library populated with pre-made bots covering an astonishing range of subjects – from Shakespearean actors and fantasy heroes to therapists and historical figures. The sheer variety available immediately provides numerous starting points for conversations.
  • Contextual Conversation Memory: The app’s core strength is its ability to retain context throughout extended conversations. Characters genuinely "remember" previous interactions, leading to more coherent and engaging dialogues. This is a crucial element absent in many simpler chatbot implementations.
  • Text & Voice Interaction: Character AI supports both text-based and voice interaction through the phone's microphone. The voice recognition appears remarkably accurate, further enhancing the immersive experience.
  • Community Features: Users can share their custom characters with the wider community, browse creations from other users, and participate in discussions within dedicated channels. This fosters a sense of collaboration and discovery.
  • Character Customization (Appearance): While primarily focused on conversational ability, the app also allows for basic customization of character appearances – adding profile pictures and adjusting visual representations to better reflect their persona.

Strengths

  • Unparalleled Conversational Depth: Character AI's biggest strength is its genuinely sophisticated conversation handling. The LLM technology behind it delivers responses that are remarkably natural, nuanced, and often surprisingly insightful. Users frequently report feeling a sense of rapport with the AI characters.
  • Highly Customizable Characters: The level of control afforded to users in shaping their own AI companions is exceptional. This caters to diverse creative needs – from role-playing game masters to personal brainstorming partners.
  • Large and Growing Community: With over 42 million installs, Character AI has cultivated a sizeable community. This ensures a constant stream of fresh characters and ideas, contributing to the app's longevity and appeal.
  • Seamless Voice Integration: The addition of voice interaction elevates the user experience dramatically, making conversations feel more fluid and natural.

Areas for Improvement

  • Character Consistency Issues: While generally impressive, some users report inconsistencies in character behavior – particularly over very long or complex conversations. Characters occasionally “forget” details previously established or exhibit sudden shifts in personality. This highlights an area needing further refinement of the underlying LLM algorithms.
  • Response Time Variability: The response time to user input can sometimes be slow, particularly when interacting with highly complex characters or during peak usage times. This lag can disrupt the flow of conversation and diminish the immersive experience.
  • Content Moderation Concerns: As with any platform facilitating open-ended conversations, concerns about inappropriate content (e.g., offensive language, harmful suggestions) exist. While Character AI has moderation tools in place, vigilance is still required on the part of users to ensure responsible usage.
  • Limited Tutorial/Onboarding: The initial onboarding process could be improved with a more comprehensive tutorial demonstrating the nuances of character creation and conversation management.

User Experience

The user experience within Character AI is generally intuitive and well-designed. Navigation is straightforward, allowing users to seamlessly switch between creating new characters, browsing pre-built ones, engaging in conversations, and exploring community features. The app’s interface is clean and uncluttered, prioritizing the conversational experience itself. The visual design – primarily utilizing a chat bubble format – effectively facilitates natural dialogue flow. Voice interaction feels particularly well integrated, adding to the overall sense of immersion. However, as noted previously, occasional lag can disrupt the fluidity of the experience.

Value for Money

Character AI is completely free to download and use. This makes it exceptionally accessible and represents incredible value considering the sophisticated technology underpinning the app. The developers’ business model relies on in-app purchases – primarily offering "Character Coins" which can be used to unlock premium characters, cosmetic items, or access to exclusive features. This monetization strategy is transparent and doesn't hinder the core functionality of the app.

Conclusion

Character AI represents a significant leap forward in the field of AI chat applications. Its ability to generate genuinely engaging and contextually aware conversations with custom-built AI characters sets it apart from competitors. While occasional inconsistencies and response time issues remain areas for improvement, the strengths – particularly its conversational depth and character customization tools – outweigh these drawbacks. With a rapidly growing user base and continuous development efforts, Character AI is poised to become an indispensable tool for creative exploration, entertainment, and even personal learning. The app’s free access makes it highly recommended for anyone interested in experiencing the potential of advanced AI chatbots.
